name: owncloud_phoenix
title: ownCloud Phoenix
description: A safe home for all your data

scripts.acceptance-tests: cucumber-js --require-module babel-core/register --require tests/acceptance/setup-local.js --require tests/acceptance/stepDefinitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty tests/acceptance/features
scripts.acceptance-tests-drone: cucumber-js --require-module babel-core/register --require tests/acceptance/setup-drone.js --require tests/acceptance/stepDefinitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty tests/acceptance/features

author: Felix Heidecke
